title: Fan, 1780–90
medium:
Medium: paper, ivory, metallic
Technique: painted
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robertson D. Ward, from the collection of her mother, Mrs. Helen Wright-Clark Dawson
description: Pleated fan. Front leaf of die cut and painted paper showing oval and diamond-shaped panels, back leaf of die cut paper; sticks of ivory with applied metallic foil.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fan, 1780–90.
1780–90. Medium: paper, ivory, metallic
Technique: painted. Gift of Mrs. Robertson D. Ward, from the collection of her mother, Mrs. Helen Wright-Clark Dawson. 1970-58-25.
